What would be *really* cool is if this happened to be a prelude, an 
introduction, to PBS picking up the NHK drama.  Anyone got any PBS 
connections??  :-D

Thanks for the heads-up and the link!!  With my luck, KAET has 
already started showing it (or shown it).

phil (who's spent the whole afternoon writing thanks to that stupid 
movie and will try to keep it a one-shot story and NOT start another 
multi-parter)

--- In SHQ@yahoogroups.com, "Grace Battista" <mg_batt@y...> wrote:
> You people probably already know about this but for those who do 
not 
> PBS is going to air Japan: Memoirs of a Secret Empire. I'm not sure 
> how many episodes it is but so far I think they will show three on 
> WTTW Chicago on May 26 8PM. You'll have to check your own listings 
> though...
> 
> They also have a nicely done website tacking the subject divided 
> into "Enter Edo", "Travel Tokaido" and a timeline... Good if you're 
> like me who needed a crash course.... ^_^
> Here's the link:  http://www.pbs.org/empires/japan/index.html
